channel.title: CVE Feed for Nokia -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nokia -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2483|2024-08-03T00:39:07.993Z -- nokia -- asik%20airscale
item.description: The bootloader in the Nokia ASIK AirScale system module (versions 474021A.101 and 474021A.102) loads public keys for firmware verification signature. If an attacker modifies the flash contents to corrupt the keys, secure boot could be permanently disabled on a given device.

item.title: CVE-2022-2484|2024-08-03T00:39:07.812Z -- nokia -- asik%20airscale
item.description: The signature check in the Nokia ASIK AirScale system module version 474021A.101 can be bypassed allowing an attacker to run modified firmware. This could result in the execution of a malicious kernel, arbitrary programs, or modified Nokia programs.

item.title: CVE-2022-2482|2024-08-03T00:39:07.824Z -- nokia -- asik%20airscale
item.description: A vulnerability exists in Nokiaâ€™s ASIK AirScale system module (versions 474021A.101 and 474021A.102) that could allow an attacker to place a script on the file system accessible from Linux. A script placed in the appropriate place could allow for arbitrary code execution in the bootloader.
